Html: I am not able to add more than one chart on one single excel sheet? Does anyone know how to do it?

How are you trying to add charts; the number of charts added to a sheet should be limited only by your available memory.

You create a chart (as shown in the examples in /Tests) set its position, then add it to the worksheet; create a second chart, set its position, add it to the worksheet, etc.
I've added an example showing how to create two charts on the same worksheet in the /Tests folder (the file is 33chartcreate-multiple-charts.php) that can be found in the develop branch on github
